alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Henderson; McDonough (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 10:24PM CDT until May 06 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN HANCOCK...SOUTH CENTRAL HENDERSON AND WESTERN MCDONOUGH COUNTIES... At 1024 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Blandinsville, or 11 miles west of Macomb, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Colchester, Tennessee, Sciota, Argyle Lake State Park, Macomb, Good Hope, Western Illinois University, Fandon, McDonough County 4-H Grounds, Spring Lake, Macomb Municipal Airport and Scottsburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
